channel.title: Windows help
channel.description:
Hi,
Due to a screwed up windows media center edition, it told me I needed to reinstall it. But the store didn't give me a copy of the cd when they sold me it, so I had to use an XP Professional CD from my school laptop. Now, I have no way of activating it, the sound doesn't work [unless I use an external audio device], all of my old programs are asking to be reinstalled because the registries been wiped, and I don't have media center support. What can I do to get this back? Would the best thing to do be download a copy of MCE? PS Mom doesn't want me to install linux :P I might dual boot it anyways though.

item.title: Windows help
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Thanks for all of your help everyone

Read full topic

item.title: Windows help
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Download a version with no need to activate, the Updates will also work.

Like this: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4162605/Windows_XP_PRO_SP3_(5508)_VistaVG_Ultimate_Style

Tested it in VMware and it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows help
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

To Activate your copy of windows, either Copy the Product Key from the installation CD, Activate it via the Internet (If it’s available) or get on the phone with them via the toll free number provided (they’ll give you the access key) and your copy should now be activated.

The reason why your sound is not working is because the drivers have not been installed, ocne you re-install Windows, you’ll have to re-install each driver that requires software because it overwrites most system files (But you keep the users ;)).

Hope this helped

P.S: I will also not recommend using an illegal copy of Windows XP as activation will fail and you’ll be unable to receie updates for Microsoft products.

Read full topic

item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Uriko:

Why don’t you go back to the store with the receipt and ask for the CD? They’re supposed to give it to you… lol

It’s been about 3 years, and I think the store is out of business now Stupid wal mart.

Cruzer:

torrent it…

USENET
